qqa.be
Class BEXtractor

java.lang.Object
  qqa.be.BEXtractor

public class BEXtractor
extends java.lang.Object

Saves answers to files and allows to call BEwT_E on them to generate BE files and equivalence classes. These files are saved in _QQA/data/BE/final/BEs _QQA/data/BE/final/eqClasses WARNING: creating an instance of this object deletes the content of those directories!

Constructor Summary
BEXtractor()
          ] Deletes the content of the following directories to avoid conflicts _QQA/data/BE/final/BEs _QQA/data/BE/final/eqClasses
